string.text: 20 round magazine for the Mauser M712 pistol. As part of the process of developing the M712, the C96's internal 10 round magazine was replaced with a detachable 10 or 20 round box.
20 round magazine for the Type 80 pistol. While the Type 80 features a slower rate of fire compared to the Mauser M712 it was based on, these 20 round magazines still empty rather quickly.
